Package jbt.model.task.decorator

Class Summary
ModelDecorator This class represents a decorator of a task.
ModelHierarchicalContextManager A ModelHierarchicalContextManager is a decorator that creates a new context for its child task.
ModelInterrupter An ModelInterrupter is a decorator that controls the termination of a child task.
ModelInverter ModelInverter is a decorator used to invert the status code returned by its child.
ModelLimit Limit is a decorator that limits the number of times a task can be executed.
ModelRepeat ModelRepeat represents a decorator that runs its child task forever.
ModelSafeContextManager A ModelSafeContextManager is a decorator that creates a new context for its child task.
ModelSafeOutputContextManager A ModelSafeOutputContextManager is a decorator that creates a new context for its child task.
ModelSucceeder A ModelSucceeder is a decorator that makes its child succeeds no matter it it actually fails.
ModelUntilFail The ModelUntilFail class represents a decorator used to run a task as long as it does not fail.
